00038 namespace Hypertable {
00039 
00044   class ApplicationQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00045 
00046     class UsageRec {
00047     public:
00048       UsageRec() : threadGroup(0), running(false), outstanding(1) { return; }
00049       uint64_t threadGroup;
00050       bool     running;
00051       int      outstanding;
00052     };
00053 
00054     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, UsageRec *> UsageRecMapT;
00055 
00056     class WorkRec {
00057     public:
00058       WorkRec(ApplicationHandler *ah) : handler(ah), usage(0) { return; }
00059       ~WorkRec() { delete handler; }
00060       ApplicationHandler   *handler;
00061       UsageRec             *usage;
00062     };
00063 
00064     class ApplicationQueueState {
00065     public:
00066       ApplicationQueueState() : queue(), usageMap(), queueMutex(), usageMutex(), cond(), shutdown(false) { return; }
00067       list<WorkRec *>     queue;
00068       UsageRecMapT        usageMap;
00069       boost::mutex        queueMutex;
00070       boost::mutex        usageMutex;
00071       boost::condition    cond;
00072       bool                shutdown;
00073     };
00074 
00075     class Worker {
00076 
00077     public:
00078 
00079       Worker(ApplicationQueueState &qstate) : m_state(qstate) {
00080         return;
00081       }
00082 
00083       void operator()() {
00084         WorkRec *rec = 0;
00085         list<WorkRec *>::iterator iter;
00086 
00087         while (true) {
00088 
00089           {  // !!! maybe ditch this block specifier
00090             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.queueMutex);
00091 
00092             while (m_state.queue.empty()) {
00093               if (m_state.shutdown) {
00094                 cerr << "shutdown!!!" << endl;
00095                 return;
00096               }
00097               m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00098             }
00099 
00100             {
00101               boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usageMutex);
00102 
00103               for (iter = m_state.queue.begin(); iter != m_state.queue.end(); iter++) {
00104                 rec = (*iter);
00105                 if (rec->usage == 0 || !rec->usage->running) {
00106                   if (rec->usage)
00107                     rec->usage->running = true;
00108                   m_state.queue.erase(iter);
00109                   break;
00110                 }
00111                 rec = 0;
00112               }
00113             }
00114           }
00115                     
00116           if (rec) {
00117             rec->handler->run();
00118             if (rec->usage) {
00119               boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usageMutex);
00120               rec->usage->running = false;
00121               rec->usage->outstanding--;
00122               if (rec->usage->outstanding == 0) {
00123                 m_state.usageMap.erase(rec->usage->threadGroup);
00124                 delete rec->usage;
00125               }
00126             }
00127             delete rec;
00128           }
00129         }
00130 
00131         cerr << "thread exit" << endl;
00132       }
00133 
00134     private:
00135       ApplicationQueueState &m_state;
00136     };
00137 
00138     boost::mutex           m_mutex;
00139     ApplicationQueueState  m_state;
00140     boost::thread_group    m_threads;
00141     bool joined;
00142 
00143   public:
00144 
00151     ApplicationQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00152       Worker Worker(m_state);
00153       assert (worker_count > 0);
00154       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00155         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00156       //threads
00157     }
00158 
00164     void shutdown() {
00165       m_state.shutdown = true;
00166       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00167     }
00168 
00173     void join() {
00174       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00175       if (!joined) {
00176         m_threads.join_all();
00177         joined = true;
00178       }
00179     }
00180 
00187     void add(ApplicationHandler *appHandler) {
00188       UsageRecMapT::iterator uiter;
00189       uint64_t threadGroup = appHandler->get_thread_group();
00190       WorkRec *rec = new WorkRec(appHandler);
00191       rec->usage = 0;
00192 
00193       if (threadGroup != 0) {
00194         boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usageMutex);
00195         if ((uiter = m_state.usageMap.find(threadGroup)) != m_state.usageMap.end()) {
00196           rec->usage = (*uiter).second;
00197           rec->usage->outstanding++;
00198         }
00199         else {
00200           rec->usage = new UsageRec();
00201           rec->usage->threadGroup = threadGroup;
00202           m_state.usageMap[threadGroup] = rec->usage;
00203         }
00204       }
00205 
00206       {
00207         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.queueMutex);
00208         m_state.queue.push_back(rec);
00209         m_state.cond.notify_one();
00210       }
00211     }
00212   };
00213   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ApplicationQueue> ApplicationQueuePtr;
00214 
00215 }
